characters: Driver of a black sedan, driver of an orange car
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a highway. A black sedan is seen overtaking the self-driving vehicle from the right side. The orange car ahead maintains a consistent speed. Suddenly, a cloud of dust appears on the left side of the road, potentially indicating an accident or obstacle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while being overtaken by the black sedan from the right side. The vehicle continues to drive straight, keeping a safe distance from the orange car ahead. The appearance of dust on the left side prompts the driver to be cautious.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A black sedan, approximately 5 meters away, overtaking the self-driving vehicle. 2) Front: An orange car, approximately 20 meters away, maintaining a consistent speed. 3) Left side: A cloud of dust, approximately 10 meters away, potentially indicating an accident or obstacle.
